article_title: Australia hints it could recognise Palestinian state
sentence: The  Australian  government  has  in  recent  months  increasingly  voiced  concerns  about  the  war  against  Hamas  in  Gaza  -  including  after  an  Australian  aid  worker  was  killed  alongside  six  others  in  an  Israeli  air  strike.

article_title: Australia hints it could recognise Palestinian state
sentence: The  war  in  Gaza,  Israel's  response  to  a  Hamas-led  attack  on  7  October  that  killed  about  1,200  people  and  saw  more  than  250  taken  hostage,  has  killed  more  than  33,000  Palestinians,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
